source:
# Group Exercise

Each group gets two columns assigned. Each group should plot a histogram for each column and report the following properties:

Skewness, Median, Mean, Mode and additional obervations!

Also think about missing values. Calculate the proportion of them and reflect the influence of them missing. 

- Gr. 1: Reading_Time_Minutes, Institution_Type
- Gr. 2: Visitors_Per_Day, Project_Type 
- Gr. 3: Engagement_Index, Region
- Gr. 4: Digitization_Progress, Time_Period_Focus
- Gr. 5: Metadata_Accuracy, Primary_Tool_Used


Rule of thumb Skewness
- Right-skewed (positive skew): mod < med < average
- symmetrical: mod = med = average
- Left-skewed (negative skew): mod > med > average

![Skewness](https://miro.medium.com/v2/resize:fit:846/1*XU3Kdl521XnWHECHZ7XOaQ.jpeg)
